text: Zovite ikh (t. ye. priyemnykh detey) po [imenam] ikh [krovnykh] ottsov, eto boleye spravedlivo pred Allakhom. Yesli zhe vy ne znayete ikh ottsov, to oni [vse zhe] - vashi brat'ya po vere i vashi blizkiye. Ne budet na vas grekha, yesli pri etom vy sovershite oshibku. Yesli zhe vy namerenno [lishayete priyemnogo syna imeni yego krovnogo ottsa], to vy sovershayete grekh. A ved' Allakh - proshchayushchiy, miloserdnyy
